texts: Rate your well-being before and after completing CBT exercises. We recommend assessing daily to monitor the progress of your well-being.
This feature is at your discretion, but we suggest two approaches:
First, assess in the morning. Throughout the day, engage in CBT exercises, conduct experiments, and have sessions with your therapist. Then, reassess your well-being in the evening.
Alternatively, evaluate right before starting activities in the app or a session with a psychologist, and then rate again immediately after completing the exercises.
Both options are valid. Choose the one that suits you best.
